Functions¶

here we talk about a very interresting functions !!! THE POPO Function

flopack.functions.popofunction(x)¶

A powerful function tha computes \(y=x*popo!\)

Parameters:x (float) – the x values
Return type:float 
>>> x=5
>>> y=popofunction(x)
>>> y
'popo! popo! popo! popo! popo! '
>>> print "AMAZING !!"
AMAZING !!

Note

This function is not suitable for the approach pee !
